SELECT *, IF(io_input = '1', '매입','매출') AS io_inout, IF(io_input = '1', io_price, 0) AS io_iprice, IF(io_input = '2', io_price, 0) AS io_oprice,
IF(io_input = '1', io_price * io_quan, 0) AS io_itotal, IF(io_input = '2', io_price * io_quan, 0) AS io_ototal
FROM tbl_iolist ORDER BY io_date DESC, io_time DESC

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_iolist ( io_seq BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, io_date VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, io_time VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, io_input VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, io_pname VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, io_price INT NOT NULL, io_quan INT NOT NULL, io_total INT )
